items.title: 'Heavy metal? It's not even aluminium foil football'
items.summary: As Liverpool are booed off following a goalless draw against Leeds, it was hardly the start to the New Year that Arne Slot's side would have wanted.

items.title: Man City lose ground on Arsenal with Sunderland draw
items.summary: Manchester City missed the chance to go back within two points of leaders Arsenal as Sunderland held out for a goalless draw to maintain their unbeaten record at the Stadium of Light.

items.title: Chelsea confirm Maresca exit amid poor PL run
items.summary: Chelsea confirmed Thursday they have parted ways with manager Enzo Maresca ahead of Sunday's game against Manchester City.

items.title: Liverpool disappointed as unbeaten run goes to 8
items.summary: Arne Slot described Liverpool's 0-0 draw with Leeds United as a "disappointment" despite his team extending their unbeaten run to eight games in all competitions.

items.title: Sources: Spurs' Johnson agrees move to Palace
items.summary: Tottenham winger Brennan Johnson has agreed to join Crystal Palace in a deal worth ¬£35 million ($47.2m), sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Gabon govt. suspends team over AFCON flop
items.summary: Gabon's government have come down hard on the country's national team following their shambolic performance at the Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).

items.title: Sunderland halt Man City's winning run with goalless draw
items.summary: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Sunderland‚Äôs match against Manchester City in the Premier League.

items.title: VI Live: drie keer 0-0 op teleurstellende Premier League-avond
items.summary: Namens de redactie van VI nogmaals de beste wensen! Op deze nieuwjaarsdag is er traditioneel voetbal uit de Premier League. Uiteraard volgen we dat in deze VI Live allemaal op de voet.. Veel plezier.

items.title: Stubborn Sunderland deny Manchester City to give Arsenal four-point cushion at top
items.summary: Something had to give and it was not Sunderland‚Äôs unbeaten home Premier League record. Instead Manchester City‚Äôs winning streak came to a juddering halt as Pep Guardiola‚Äôs side spurned a chance to move within two points of Arsenal at the top of the table. Hats ‚Äì or should that be chapeaus ‚Äì off to R√©gis Le Bris and his clever and courageous Sunderland team for not merely frustrating City but offering Gianluigi Donnarumma scope to remind everyone precisely why he is a world-class goalkeeper. Continue reading...

items.title: Brentford draw with 'boring' Spurs on Frank‚Äôs return
items.summary: Brentford were held to a goalless draw with Tottenham on Thomas Frank‚Äôs return to his former club as Spurs supporters sang "boring, boring Tottenham" at the Gtech Community Stadium.

items.title: New year, same problems for a Liverpool side lacking depth, dynamism
items.summary: Devoid of the swagger that marked last season's title run, Liverpool's draw with Leeds showed how much work remains for Arne Slot.

items.title: Drie Nederlanders van Sunderland houden Man City in toom en helpen Arsenal
items.summary: Het prachtige seizoen van Robin Roefs, Lutsharel Geertruida en Brian Brobbey met Sunderland heeft donderdagavond een volgend hoofdstuk gekregen. Titelkandidaat Manchester City werd op een doelpuntloos gelijkspel gehouden in het Stadium of Light, waardoor de nummer twee van de Premier League in ieder geval voor even koploper Arsenal uit beeld is verloren.

items.title: 'Another OUTSTANDING save!' | Roefs' 'brilliant reflex' save denies Gvardiol
items.summary: Roefs produces a 'brilliant reflex' save to deny Gvardiol during Manchester City's Premier League match against Sunderland.

items.title: Eerste 0-0 van Liverpool onder Slot: 'Liverpool is zijn magie kwijt'
items.summary: De Engelse media concludeerden na de remise van Liverpool tegen Leeds United dat het nog altijd niet goed zit bij de ploeg van Arne Slot. Liverpool toonde de afgelopen weken herstel met vier zeges op rij, maar liet in het eerste duel van 2026 weer punten liggen. 'Ze oogden futloos en voorspelbaar.'

items.title: 'Zaakwaarnemer' Valente doet aan klantenbinding met gewilde Resink
items.summary: Tijdens de voetbalpauzes zoeken voetballers elkaar regelmatig op om op vakantie te gaan, waarbij eilanden een geliefde bestemming zijn. Zo ook voor Luciano Valente, Stije Resink en Thijmen Blokzijl, die naar Cura√ßao trokken om de winterse kou in Nederland te ontlopen. Mogelijk heeft Valente aan klantenbinding gedaan.

items.title: Slot legt vinger op zere Liverpool-plek: 'Helaas wordt dat niet erkend'
items.summary: Arne Slot baalt flink van de remise van Liverpool thuis tegen promovendus Leeds United . De Nederlandse manager zag zijn ploeg moeite hebben met een compact georganiseerde opponent. Hij legde de vinger op de zere plek.

items.title: Rosenior leading contender for Chelsea job
items.summary: Strasbourg boss Liam Rosenior is the leading contender to be the next Chelsea manager, but others remain under consideration.

items.title: Glasner‚Äôs Crystal Palace in ‚Äòsurvival mode‚Äô as Fulham leveller extends winless run
items.summary: It is a strange quirk of this fixture that the away side has not lost for the last 10 Premier League meetings between Crystal Palace and Fulham, with the substitute Tom Cairney‚Äôs late equaliser ensuring that streak goes on. Only a brilliant save in added time from Dean Henderson and a glaring miss from the former Palace player Joachim Andersen denied Marco Silva‚Äôs side all the points after falling behind to Jean-Philippe Mateta‚Äôs first goal from open play since 1 November. But Oliver Glasner was still bitterly disappointed that his team could not end a sequence of six games without a victory in all competitions after running out of steam again in their 31st match of the season. ‚ÄúWe are a little bit in survival mode,‚Äù said the Palace manager, whose team now face three games in the space of seven days. Continue reading...

items.title: Ipswich rise into Championship‚Äôs top two as rivals Coventry and Boro slip up
items.summary: Philogene and Akpom goals secure 2-1 win over Oxford Charlton hold Coventry 1-1; Derby upset Middlesbrough Ipswich climbed into the automatic promotion places in the Championship following a 2-1 victory over struggling Oxford. Their success came via first-half goals from leading scorer Jaden Philogene and Chuba Akpom, while Will Lankshear replied for the visitors. Ipswich moved a point above Middlesbrough after they fell to a 1-0 defeat at Derby, while Oxford remain three points from safety. Continue reading...

items.title: Obdurate Leeds keep toiling Liverpool at arm‚Äôs length to earn point
items.summary: Two unbeaten records were maintained at Anfield but only one team took satisfaction along with their point. Leeds succeeded in stifling and frustrating Liverpool as the first goalless draw of Arne Slot‚Äôs reign underlined the limitations that linger behind the Premier League champions‚Äô recent recovery. A drab scoreless draw, the first in 84 Liverpool games under Slot, owed much to the defensive excellence of Jaka Bijol and Pascal Struijk as Daniel Farke‚Äôs depleted visitors extended their unbeaten run to six matches and moved seven points clear of the relegation zone. But Liverpool‚Äôs contribution to a meagre spectacle was significant too. Continue reading...
